data.message: Hi bab'e its me.  Im so damn much in love with you after all these years.  Countdown till i see you starts today bab'e pray.  Fast. Meditate. Use all your strength. I want you so bad. Its such a shame how week my will is got to overcome. Waiting on the ultimate first date. How hot is this. Bab'e. If you can come come quick. Like jimmy johns quick.  K sweet cakes see you soon. Love always kim mathers🔥🎭 forlife!
